news.title: CMAT, Joshua Burnside and pôt-pot make BBC Radio 6 Music Albums of the Year list
news.summary: Each of the albums will be explored across special upcoming episodes of Matt Everitt’s New Album Fix show.

news.title: BIIRD, Florence Road, Kíla and more added to line-up for New Year's Festival Dublin
news.summary: Tickets for the Countdown Concert with headliner Inhaler are on sale now.

news.title: Live Report: The Last Dinner Party fire up 3Arena with raucous extravaganza
news.summary: The London five-piece kicked off their world tour with an explosive return to Dublin on Friday, featuring shiver-inducing arrangements and a healthy dose of drama.

news.title: The Pogues' 'Fairytale of New York' to be released as limited edition 12” zoetrope vinyl EP
news.summary: The limited edition release – which features the previously unreleased live version of 'Fairytale of New York' at Glasgow's Barrowland – is available to pre-order now

news.title: Lewis Capaldi shares live video for ‘The Day That I Die’
Irish music documentary Celtic Utopia wins Audience Award at Leeds International Film Festival
news.summary: The documentary features performances and contributions by a range of alternative folk and traditional musicians.

news.title: Babyshambles' Adam Ficek pays tribute to late bandmate Patrick Walden following London date on comeback tour
news.summary: Adam Ficek says Babyshambles’ emotional Brixton show marked “an important part of the band’s grieving process” following Patrick Walden’s death.

news.title: Reactions pour in after Ireland's victory over Hungary: "Stick that up your bollox Viktor Orbán"
news.summary: KNEECAP, Wallfella, Bressie and more took to social media to celebrate the win. Oh, and a few politicians too...

news.title: Dropkick Murphys announce Fairview Park gig
